title: From Lead to Customer: Experience Efficient Conversion Process
subtitle: Learn how to claim leads from the lead pool, conduct 360° comprehensive follow-up, and ultimately convert them seamlessly into opportunities and contacts.

steps.title: Lead Pool
steps.description: This is where all unassigned leads reside. Sales team members can discover potential customers here and start following up.

steps.title: Step 1: Lead Claim & Follow-up
steps.description: Leads in the pool need to be assigned and followed up to create value. Let's start by claiming a lead.

steps.title: One-Click Lead Claim
steps.description: Found a high-value lead? No complex process needed - click "Claim" to lock it under your name, ready to start follow-up.

steps.title: Quickly Locate Your Leads
steps.description: After claiming, you can use powerful filtering features to quickly find target leads by name, status, or any other criteria in "My Leads".

steps.title: Step 2: Lead Details & Process Management
steps.description: Click to enter the lead details page, your command center for managing all information and activities related to this lead.

steps.title: Enter 360° Customer View
steps.description: The details page aggregates lead status, basic information, and core operations like status changes, return to pool, and the crucial "Lead Conversion" button.

steps.title: Real-time Follow-up Status Update
steps.description: As communication deepens, you can update lead status anytime, ensuring team information sync and accurate sales stage reflection.

steps.title: Manage Tasks
steps.description: In the "Tasks" tab, create follow-up tasks for yourself to ensure every sales action is well-organized.

steps.title: Schedule Meetings & Events
steps.description: In the "Events" tab, you can record and manage meetings, calls, and other schedules with customers, never missing important appointments.

steps.title: Archive Communication Emails
steps.description: All important emails exchanged with this lead can be archived and viewed here, creating a complete communication record.

steps.title: Trace Change History
steps.description: The "History" tab clearly records every information modification, making all operations traceable for review and management.

steps.title: Step 3: Lead Conversion & Value Realization
steps.description: When a lead matures, the most crucial step is converting it into actual business opportunities. Let's begin!

steps.title: Start Lead Conversion Process
steps.description: Return to the main details page and click the "Lead Conversion" button. The system will guide you to seamlessly create new customers, contacts, and opportunities.

steps.title: Create Associated Opportunity
steps.description: During conversion, you can directly create an opportunity and automatically import key lead information without duplicate entry.

steps.title: Complete Opportunity Information
steps.description: Add estimated amount, expected close date, and other opportunity information, then click "Save" to lay the foundation for subsequent win analysis.

steps.title: Complete Conversion
steps.description: After confirming all information is correct, click "OK" and the system will automatically complete all entity creation and associations.

steps.title: Verify Conversion Results
steps.description: Now, let's go to the "Opportunities" page to see the new opportunity successfully converted from the lead - a seamless sales process connection!

button.label: Go to Opportunities List, Conversion Successful!
